attributes.action: Stop the congestion charge through out main land Uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
No body in there right mind enjoys driving these days, gatso,gridlock cost of fuel.

Each and every UK driver is paying a congestion charge, through the cost of fuel. The days of the sunday drivers have since gone. having worked for so called public transport, it is now apparrent , that there is no such industry.
congestion charges are already in affect, through, the high taxation of fuel
